channel.title: Christmas on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Christmas on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I made a Christmas tree lighting game with Python
item.description: # Made *The video is double speed. I made a game in Python that connects electric paths and lights a Christmas tree light bulb. GUI uses Tkinter. The original story is a game that appeared on NORAD’s Santa tracking website a few years ago. Remembering that I loved it all the time, I decided to make it with Python, which I’ve been studying and can use nowadays. #Environment Python 3.
